channel.title: Sources on Brick Schema
channel.description: Recent content in Sources on Brick Schema

item.title: Development
item.description: GitHub Development of the Brick Schema can be found on GitHub Brick TTL files Example Buildings Example Applications Brick is created from collective efforts. Process The Brick schema files were generated by: Identifying necessary terminologies from existing building metadata and modern applications. The result is the Building application list. Organizing the terminologies into Tags/Tagsets in a spreadsheet. The result is the Schema Engineering Sheet Converting the spreadsheet into Turtle files.
